dcterms:description: The Materials Project dataset comprises more than 120K materials with a complete specification of their crystal structure and some important physical properties obtained with high-throughput DFT calculations.

dcterms:description: The Perov-5 dataset includes materials that share the same Perovskite crystal structure, used for regression of the heat of formation computed through DFT.
